description.value: Major Boon: Grandmother Spider rejoices in freedom and tricks those who would limit it. Any time you would become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Grabbed]{Grabbed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Immobilized]{Immobilized}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Restrained]{Restrained}, attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:10]. On a success, you ignore the effect, and the originator of the effect becomes grabbed, immobilized, or restrained instead. If this simply causes a creature to grab itself, it can usually @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Escape]{Escape} as a free action, but it might be stuck if it tried to immobilize you in other ways.
